You can use StarCheat to directly import these items.
StarCheat: http://starcheat.org/

Don't have either of these set up? You can also use the below commands to spawn the items at your cursor (requires /admin mode to be active).
These commands will spawn tools without their icon.

/spawnitem flashlight 1 '{"shortdescription":"WE_Select","twoHanded":true,"inventoryIcon":"","image":"flashlight.png?hueshift=100","largeImage":"flashlightlarge.png?hueshift=100"}'

WE_Select:
/spawnitem flashlight 1 '{"shortdescription":"WE_Select","twoHanded":true,"inventoryIcon":"/assetMissing.png?scale=1?crop=0;0;16;16?replace;ffffff00=ffffffff?blendmult=/objects/outpost/customsign/signplaceholder.png;0;0?replace;01000101=00000000;01000201=00000000;01000301=00000000;01000401=00000000;01000501=00000000;01000601=00000000;01000701=00000000;01000801=00000000;02000101=00000000;02000201=00000000;02000301=00000000;02000401=00000000;02000501=00000000;02000601=00000000;02000701=00000000;02000801=00000000;03000101=00000000;03000201=00000000;03000301=00000000;03000401=00000000;03000501=00000000;03000601=00000000;03000701=00000000;03000801=00000000;04000101=00000000;04000201=00000000;04000301=00000000;04000401=00000000;04000501=00000000;04000601=00000000;04000701=00000000;04000801=00000000;05000101=00000000;05000201=00000000;05000301=00000000;05000401=00000000;05000501=00000000;05000601=00000000;05000701=000000ff;05000801=00000000;06000101=00000000;06000201=00000000;06000301=00000000;06000401=00000000;06000501=00000000;06000601=000000ff;06000701=fefefeff;06000801=000000ff;07000101=00000000;07000201=00000000;07000301=00000000;07000401=00000000;07000501=000000ff;07000601=cececeff;07000701=fefefeff;07000801=fefefeff;08000101=00000000;08000201=00000000;08000301=00000000;08000401=00000000;08000501=00000000;08000601=000000ff;08000701=cececeff;08000801=fefefeff;09000101=00000000;09000201=00000000;09000301=00000000;09000401=00000000;09000501=00000000;09000601=00000000;09000701=000000ff;09000801=cececeff;10000101=00000000;10000201=00000000;10000301=00000000;10000401=00000000;10000501=00000000;10000601=00000000;10000701=00000000;10000801=000000ff;11000101=00000000;11000201=00000000;11000301=00000000;11000401=00000000;11000501=00000000;11000601=00000000;11000701=00000000;11000801=00000000;12000101=00000000;12000201=00000000;12000301=00000000;12000401=00000000;12000501=00000000;12000601=00000000;12000701=00000000;12000801=00000000;13000101=00000000;13000201=00000000;13000301=00000000;13000401=00000
